name: Hellenic Culture Centre - Ifigenia Georgiadou
goal: The aims of the institution are to promote language learning and language teaching and to contribute to adult education and intercultural education methodology, as well as cultural tourism. It also works on:research on educational needs and on cultural and educational tourism, teaching methods; production of educational materials and methods of long-distance learning; planning of programmes, curricula and educational and educational tourism  services to other organizations
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Migration and asylum, Youth
euInitiatives: Επί του παρόντος δεν παρακολουθούνται συγκεκριμένοι φάκελοι σχετικά με την πολιτική και τη νομοθεσία στην ΕΕ
